releaseNotes: Performance improvement: Significant optimization in visit algorythm (skipping not needed visits for null values). TypeBuilder.Build() is now quicker when using types with many type-wise circular references - You can use 'guard:PropertyGuard' parameter, it will block endless cycles. If your visitor should not clone objects, you should set parameter 'supportsCloning:bool' parameter to false (decreases build time drastically by omitting cloning expressions creation).
summary: ExpressWalker provides a generic way to examine and change any object graph in fashion similar to "Visitor Pattern". You can build generic hierarchy composition (visitor) capable to "visit" and change any property, basing on configuration. Uses refleciton only while building a visitor and relies purely on expression trees while visiting objects (Many thanks to Francisco José Rey Gozalo for contributing with ideas and solutions).
title: ExpressWalker
